. Paroxysmal hemicrania may last indefinitely but has been known to go into remission or stop spontaneously.,NINDS,Paroxysmal Hemicrania
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Paroxysmal Hemicrania ?,"The National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS) and other institutes of the National Institutes of Health (NIH) support research related to paroxysmal hemicrania through grants to major medical institutions across the country.
